text:
I was very impressed with the quality of food from Sammers. Many businesses have come and go in the spot, but I believe this one found the right combination.

Friendly atmosphere, great burgers, and I loved the french fries.  I highly recommend stopping in for lunch or dinner.
Great wings. Wife loved the honey BBQ and I had the sweet chili and Asian pacific ones. The AP wings were superb!
Nice friendly folks. Gaming machines and sports tv's along with bar.  Good solid food. More than just normal pub food.
